Team size: Maximum 4 participants per team. Minimum 2 Participants. 1). Duration: 25hours (From 12:00hrs. on day 1 to 13:00 hrs. on day 2). 
 2) Presentation Duration: 5-7 minutes. 
 3). Q-A duration: - 3-5 minutes

1. Participants should maintain civil decorum throughout the event. 
 2. All code/modules should be written and developed during the Hackathon. 
 3. Event prizes are non-transferable. 
 4. Participants should listen to all the directions given by the organising committee. 
 5. It’s your responsibility to maintain co-ordination in the team. 
 6. At the end of the event you must present/submit a working prototype/model. 
 7. In case of any dispute, decision given by the judges will be final.
